address: No. 43 Keelung Road, Section 4, Taipei 106, Taiwan

metro.name: Taipei Metro
metro.description: Take Songshanâ€“Xindian line (Green Line) to Gongguan station (G07). Leave Gonguan station via Exit 2, and turn left. Follow Roosevelt Road and head to Keelung Road. Cross Keelung Road, turn left on Keelung Road, and walk for 4 mins. You will see National Taiwan University of Science and Technology Campus on the right hand side.

airport.name: Taoyuan Airport
airport.description:
Taoyuan Metro:
Take Commuter or Express train to Taipei Main Station (A1) from the Airport B1. And follow the "Taipei Metro" guide.

Taiwan High Speed Rail:
Take Taoyuan Metro to THSR Taoyuan Station (A18) via Commuter or Express train, then take THSR to Taipei Station, and follow the "Taipei Metro" guide.
